Package game.entity

Class MovableEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.entity.Entity
      • game.entity.MovableEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntity, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bullet, Player
    public abstract class MovableEntity
extends Entity
    This class is an extension of Entity and provides methods that can move and rotate an entity.
    Author:
    callum
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Fields inherited from class game.entity.Entity

        id, type

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MovableEntity​(float width, float height, Point position, float angle, float speed, float rotationSpeed)
      The constructor for MovableEntity, takes values for all fields and sets the fields to the given values

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void backwards()
      This moves this entity backward, in the direction opposite to the angle field by the distance of the speed field
      void forward()
      This moves this entity forward, in the direction of the angle field by the distance of the speed field
      float getRotationSpeed()
      Returns the value of rotationSpeed
      float getSpeed()
      Returns the value of speed
      void rotateLeft()
      This is used to rotate the entity in an anti-clockwise direction by rotationSpeed degrees.
      void rotateRight()
      This is used to rotate the entity in a clockwise direction by rotationSpeed degrees.
      void setRotationSpeed​(float s)
      Set a new value for the entities rotation speed.
      void setSpeed​(float s)
      Set a new value for this entities speed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovableEntity

        public MovableEntity​(float width,
                     float height,
                     Point position,
                     float angle,
                     float speed,
                     float rotationSpeed)
        The constructor for MovableEntity, takes values for all fields and sets the fields to the given values
        Parameters:
        width - The width for the new MovableEntity
        height - The height for the new MovableEntity
        position - The position for the centre of the new MovableEntity
        angle - The direction in which the new MovableEntity should point(in degrees from positive y)
        speed - The speed with which this new MovableEntity should move
        rotationSpeed - The speed that this MovableEntity should rotate

    • Method Detail

      • forward

        public void forward()
        This moves this entity forward, in the direction of the angle field by the distance of the speed field

      • backwards

        public void backwards()
        This moves this entity backward, in the direction opposite to the angle field by the distance of the speed field

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed​(float s)
        Set a new value for this entities speed. This is used by the items in order to give a speed up
        Parameters:
        s - The new speed value.

      • setRotationSpeed

        public void setRotationSpeed​(float s)
        Set a new value for the entities rotation speed. This is used by items in order to give a movement boost
        Parameters:
        s - The new value for rotationSpeed.

      • rotateRight

        public void rotateRight()
        This is used to rotate the entity in a clockwise direction by rotationSpeed degrees.

      • rotateLeft

        public void rotateLeft()
        This is used to rotate the entity in an anti-clockwise direction by rotationSpeed degrees.

      • getSpeed

        public float getSpeed()
        Returns the value of speed
        Returns:
        this entities speed

      • getRotationSpeed

        public float getRotationSpeed()
        Returns the value of rotationSpeed
        Returns:
        this entities rotationSpeed
